haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Fw Karl Nostitz
Fw Ruprecht Hess
Fw Poldi Hechler

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 13/10/1916 near Balatre Sub.
A F.E.2b of Esc 20 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Leo Scala was killed in action.
Blaise Gentillon was made a prisoner of war.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 13/10/1916 near Puisieux.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 32 Squadron RFC was brought down by Hasso Lobe of Jasta 16b.
Lt Washington Atherton was killed in action.
Hasso Lobe was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 13/10/1916 near Champien.
A F.E.2b of Esc 20 was brought down by Karl Nostitz of Jasta 16b.
Marceau Adam was killed in action.
Casimir Redinger was made a prisoner of war.
Karl Nostitz was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 13/10/1916 near StMihiel.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc N.31 was brought down by Heinrich Schonborn of Jasta 16b.
Lt Jules Kunsch was killed in action.
Heinrich Schonborn was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 13/10/1916 near Morlancourt.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 40 Squadron RFC was brought down by Urs Kehlmann of Jasta 16b.
2nd Lt Abbott Johnston was killed in action.
Urs Kehlmann was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 13/10/1916 near StMihiel.
A F.E.2b of Esc 13 was brought down by Nikolaus Fechter of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Camille Jacqueline was killed in action.
S/Lt Corentin Lachassine was killed in action.
Nikolaus Fechter was  flying a Albatros D.II.
